content: Hi, I think I need some help with my heating system.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Margaret! Can you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Actually, I think I might have the wrong number. I'm trying to reach the local heating company, but this might not be it.
I understand, Margaret. It seems you have contacted XYZ Home Services by mistake. Would you like me to mark this as a wrong number and end our conversation here?
